titleStmt.title: The articles, settlement, and offices of the Free Society of Traders in Pennsilvania agreed upon by divers merchants and others for the better improvement and government of trade in that province.
titleStmt.author: Free Society of Traders in Pennsylvania.
More, Nicholas, d. 1689.

notesStmt.note: Preface signed by Nicolas More, James Claypoole, and Philip Ford.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
